Title: Information technology – Open Distributed Processing – Reference model: Overview
Description: Provides:An introduction and motivation for ODPAn overview of the Reference Model of Open Distributed Processing (RM-ODP) and an explanation of its key conceptsGives guidance on the application of RM-ODP

Title: Information technology – Software asset management – Part 1: Processes and tiered assessment of conformance
Description: Establishes a baseline for an integrated set of processes for Software Assessment Management (SAM), divided into tiers to allow for incremental implementation, assessment, and recognition

Title: Systems and software engineering — Requirements for managers of user documentation
Description: Specifies procedures for managing user documentation throughout the software life cycle.

Title: Systems and software engineering -- Requirements for acquirers and suppliers of user documentation
Description: Defines the documentation process from the acquirer's standpoint and the supplier's standpoint.

Title: Systems and software engineering — Requirements for testers and reviewers of user documentation
Description: Defines the process in which user documentation products are tested.

Title: Systems and software engineering — Requirements for designers and developers of user documentation
Description: Specifies the structure, content, and format for user documentation, and provides informative guidance for user documentation style.

Title: Systems and software engineering — Developing user documentation in an agile environment
Description: Specifies the way in which user documentation can be developed in agile development projects.
